org.mxupdate.test
Class AbstractTest

java.lang.Object
  org.mxupdate.test.AbstractTest
Direct Known Subclasses:
AbstractDataExportUpdate, AttributeTest, Common, Dimension, IEFEBOMSyncConfigTest, IEFGlobalConfigTest, IEFGlobalRegistryTest, InterfaceTest, NotificationTest, PageTest, TypeTest
public abstract class AbstractTest
extends Object

Abstract test class to connect to MX and disconnect incl. some helper methods to execute MQL commands and JPOs.

Version:
$Id: AbstractTest.java 748 2010-02-21 23:17:20Z tim.moxter $
Author:
The MxUpdate Team

Field Detail

PREFIX

public static final String PREFIX
Prefix for all new created test objects. The prefix should be used from all test cases.

mqlAsSet

public Set<String> mqlAsSet(CharSequence _cmd)
                     throws matrix.util.MatrixException
Executes given MQL command and splits the returned value by new line '\n' and returns this values as a set.

Parameters:
_cmd - MQL command to execute
Returns:
set of found values
Throws:
matrix.util.MatrixException - if MQL execution failed

export

protected AbstractTest.Export export(AbstractTest.CI _type,
                                     String _name)
                              throws Exception
Export given configuration item _type with _name. The returned values from the export are checked for:
  • value is returned
  • the returned export value includes exact one export for given _type
  • the name of the exported object is equal _name

Parameters:
_type - type to export
_name - name to export
Returns:
map with the exported object
Throws:
Exception - if MQL calls failed

cleanup

protected void cleanup(AbstractTest.CI _type,
                       String _name)
                throws matrix.util.MatrixException
Makes a clean up for given configuration item _type with _name. This means the configuration item object is deleted.

Parameters:
_type - configuration item type to clean up (delete)
_name - name of the configuration item to clean up (delete)
Throws:
matrix.util.MatrixException - if delete failed

cleanup

protected void cleanup(AbstractTest.CI _type)
                throws matrix.util.MatrixException
Cleanups given configuration _type. This means that all existing administration object which starts with PREFIX are deleted. Only if AbstractTest.CI.wildcardSearch is true, a search via wild card is done; otherwise a list of all administration object is used.

Parameters:
_type - type of configuration item
Throws:
matrix.util.MatrixException - if cleanup for given configuration item _type failed

jpoInvoke

public <T> AbstractTest.JPOReturn<T> jpoInvoke(String _jpo,
                                               String _method,
                                               Object... _parameters)
                                    throws IOException,
                                           matrix.util.MatrixException
Calls given _method in _jpo.

Type Parameters:
T - class which is returned
Parameters:
_jpo - name of JPO to call
_method - method of the called _jpo
_parameters - list of all parameters for the _jpo which are automatically encoded encoded
Returns:
returned value from the called _jpo
Throws:
IOException - if the parameter could not be encoded
matrix.util.MatrixException - if the called _jpo throws an exception
See Also:
AbstractTest.JPOReturn

executeEncoded

public Map<?,?> executeEncoded(String _method,
                               Map<String,String> _params,
                               Object... _arguments)
                        throws IOException,
                               matrix.util.MatrixException,
                               ClassNotFoundException
Calls given _method in of the MxUpdate eclipse plug-in dispatcher. The MX context #mxContext is connected to the database if not already done.

Parameters:
_method - method of the called _jpo
_params - extra parameters
_arguments - list of all parameters for the _jpo which are automatically encoded encoded
Returns:
returned value from the called _jpo
Throws:
IOException - if the parameter could not be encoded
matrix.util.MatrixException - if the called _jpo throws an exception
ClassNotFoundException - if the class which is decoded from the returned string value could not be found
See Also:
#mxContext, #connect()

encode

                 throws IOException
Encodes given _object to a string with base64.

Parameters:
_object - object to encode
Returns:
encoded string
Throws:
IOException - if encode failed

decode

protected final <T> T decode(String _arg)
                  throws IOException,
                         ClassNotFoundException
Decodes given string value to an object of given type <T>. First the string is base64 decoded, then the object instance is extracted from the decoded bytes via the Java "standard" feature of the ObjectInputStream.

Type Parameters:
T - type of the object which must be decoded
Parameters:
_arg - string argument with encoded instance of <T>
Returns:
decoded object instance of given type <T>
Throws:
IOException - if the value could not be decoded, the decoder stream could not be opened or the argument at given _index is not defined
ClassNotFoundException - if the object itself could not be read from decoder stream

convertMql

public static String convertMql(CharSequence _text)
Converts given string to MQL by escaping the " so that in escape mode on string could be handled with " and '.

Parameters:
_text - character sequence to convert
Returns:
converted string
